insert into task_config( id, node, task_id, task_name, is_monitored, create_time, update_time ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.node}, #{item.taskId}, #{item.taskName}, #{item.isMonitored}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id=values(id), node=values(node), task_id=values(task_id), task_name=values(task_name), is_monitored=values(is_monitored), create_time=values(create_time), update_time=values(update_time)
